mil3.1.10:1.5: “Saddha kho, maharaja, uppajjamana nivarane vikkhambheti, vinivaranam cittam hoti accham vippasannam anavilam.
mil3.1.10:2.2: “Yatha, maharaja, raja cakkavatti caturanginiya senaya saddhim addhanamaggappatipanno parittam udakam tareyya, tam udakam hatthihi ca assehi ca rathehi ca pattihi ca khubhitam bhaveyya avilam lulitam kalalibhutam.
mil3.1.10:2.3: Uttinno ca raja cakkavatti manusse anapeyya ‘paniyam, bhane, aharatha, pivissami’ti, ranno ca udakappasadako mani bhaveyya.
mil3.1.10:2.4: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho te manussa ranno cakkavattissa patissutva tam udakappasadakam manim udake pakkhipeyyum, tasmim udake pakkhittamatte sankhasevalapanakam vigaccheyya, kaddamo ca sannisideyya, accham bhaveyya udakam vippasannam anavilam.
mil3.1.10:2.5: Tato ranno cakkavattissa paniyam upanameyyum ‘pivatu, deva, paniyan’ti.
mil3.1.10:3.1: Yatha, maharaja, udakam, evam cittam datthabbam, yatha te manussa, evam yogavacaro datthabbo, yatha sankhasevalapanakam kaddamo ca, evam kilesa datthabba.
mil3.1.10:3.2: Yatha udakappasadako mani, evam saddha datthabba, yatha udakappasadake manimhi udake pakkhittamatte sankhasevalapanakam vigaccheyya, kaddamo ca sannisideyya, accham bhaveyya udakam vippasannam anavilam;
mil3.1.10:3.3: evameva kho, maharaja, saddha uppajjamana nivarane vikkhambheti, vinivaranam cittam hoti accham vippasannam anavilam.
